definitions.text: commodities (goods or services) bought from a foreign country
an imported person brought from a foreign country
examples: the lead role was played by an import from Sweden
they are descendants of indentured importees

definitions.text: the message that is intended or expressed or signified
examples: what is the meaning of this sentence
the significance of a red traffic light
the import of his announcement was ambiguous

definitions.text: a meaning that is not expressly stated but can be inferred
examples: the significance of his remark became clear only later
the expectation was spread both by word and by implication
decisions of great consequence are made by the president himself
virtue is of more moment than security
that result is of no consequence

definitions.text: transfer (electronic data) into a database or document
